aboutMe: I am a developer passionate about technology and agile methodologies, with experience in various technical and leadership roles.

projectLeader.title: Project Leader / Scrum Master / Product Owner
projectLeader.description: Experience in team leadership, facilitating agile processes, and making strategic decisions. Implementation of Scrum and Kanban methodologies to improve productivity.

analystProgrammer.title: .NET Analyst Programmer
analystProgrammer.description: Specialized in developing enterprise applications using the .NET stack, including C#, ASP.NET, and SQL Server. Skilled in analyzing and optimizing complex systems.

fullstackDeveloper.title: Fullstack Developer
fullstackDeveloper.description: Developer with skills in frontend (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript) and backend (Node.js, Express, relational and non-relational databases). Experience in building responsive and scalable web applications.
